title: Huge stakes drive record turnouts for primaries, Kansas abortion vote
description: Note to listeners: Because there was still so much undecided in tonight's primaries during the 9pm ET hour, we took the audio for this episode from MSNBC's live midnight coverage when at least a call had been made by NBC News in the Kansas abortion referendum.
author: multimedia@msnbc.com (MSNBC)
content:encoded: Note to listeners: Because there was still so much undecided in tonight's primaries during the 9pm ET hour, we took the audio for this episode from MSNBC's live midnight coverage when at least a call had been made by NBC News in the Kansas abortion referendum.
